Comment: A unique ID number for the Cost Group.
The default markup on the group.
The default overhead on the group.
A descriptive name for the group.
A short (max. three characters) code for the group.
This field contains 'T' if the group's "Show on quote" option is ticked; otherwise 'F'.
This field contains 'T' if the group's "Consolidate" option is ticked; otherwise 'F'.
This field indicates what the group's "Copy from quote to:" option is set to. Will be one of:N = NoneC = CostsT = TimesheetP = Purchase
